short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PageIntel connects ChatGPT to the browser to execute your AI tasks based on the webpage content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PageIntel by MaxTAF - Enhance Your Web Experience With Powerful AI

Introducing PageIntel by MaxTaf, the groundbreaking Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way you interact with the web. Harness the power of artificial intelligence to automate tasks, extract valuable data, and gain deep insights from any webpage. Whether you're a casual web surfer, a researcher, or a professional analyst, PageIntel empowers you with advanced tools to streamline your online experience like never before.

Key Features:

AI-Driven Task Automation

Execute predefined tasks with a single click, leveraging the power of AI to process web content intelligently.
Automate complex processes, from data extraction to content analysis, saving you time and effort.
Customize tasks to suit your specific needs, ensuring maximum flexibility and efficiency.


Impromptu Question Answering

Ask questions about any webpage directly from the extension interface.
Get instant, accurate responses powered by advanced natural language processing capabilities.
Gain quick insights and extract relevant information without manual searching.


Data Extraction Made Easy

Define custom data tags to extract specific data elements from web pages automatically.
Capture prices, article summaries, metadata, and more with precision and ease.
Utilize built-in data tags for common extraction tasks, saving time on configuration.


URL-Based Task Filtering

Specify URL filters to control where AI tasks are triggered, ensuring targeted application.
Use wildcards for flexible URL matching, activating tasks only on relevant pages.
Set up cross-domain filters for tasks that require data from multiple sources.


Seamless AI Integration

Authenticate and interact with AI services like OpenAI using secure AI keys.
Configure AI URLs for advanced setups, such as routing API calls through an API gateway.
Leverage cutting-edge language models for superior performance and accuracy.


Customization and Settings Management

Personalize your PageIntel experience with extensive customization options.
Easily export and import settings, allowing for seamless backups and sharing.
Password-protect your settings to prevent unauthorized changes.


Intuitive User Interface

Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed for ease of use and quick access to features.
Navigate effortlessly with a well-organized sidebar and clear content sections.
Access help and guidance through the comprehensive user guide, ensuring a smooth learning curve.



Getting Started:

Install PageIntel by MaxTaf from the Chrome Web Store.
Launch the extension and configure your AI API key in the settings panel.
Explore the predefined tasks or create your own custom tasks tailored to your needs.
Define data tags to extract specific information from web pages automatically.
Start automating tasks, asking questions, and gaining insights with the power of AI.

Unlock the Full Potential of PageIntel:

Master the art of writing effective AI task prompts to achieve accurate and relevant responses.
Leverage URL filters and wildcards to precisely control where tasks are triggered.
Utilize CSS selectors and JSON paths for advanced data tagging and extraction.
Dive into the built-in data tags for quick access to commonly needed data elements.
Explore the import/export facilities to backup and share your customized settings effortlessly.

PageIntel by MaxTaf is your ultimate companion for an enhanced web experience. Empower yourself with AI-driven automation, data extraction, and question answering capabilities. Streamline your workflows, save time, and extract valuable insights effortlessly. Whether you're conducting research, analyzing content, or simply seeking quick answers, PageIntel has got you covered.
Elevate your web interactions to new heights with PageIntel by MaxTaf. Install the extension now and unlock a world of intelligent automation and insights. Experience the future of web browsing today!
Note: PageIntel by MaxTaf requires an OpenAI API key to function. You can sign up for an API key on the OpenAI website. Please ensure that you adhere to OpenAI's usage policies and guidelines when using the extension.
For detailed instructions, troubleshooting, and advanced features, please refer to the comprehensive user guide included with the extension. If you encounter any issues or have questions, our dedicated support team is here to assist you.
Upgrade your web experience with PageIntel by MaxTaf â€“ the ultimate AI-powered Chrome extension. Install now and revolutionize the way you interact with the web!
